#Importing libraries for data manipulation:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```


#Importing dataset from .csv fail
```{r}
dataset <- dataset <- read_csv("data/phage_counts.csv")
dataset
```

```{r}
filter(dataset, timepoint == "0")
```

```{r}
graph_1 <- dataset %>% 
    group_by(., tax_id) %>% 
    arrange(tax_id) %>% 
    count(tax_id)
graph_1
```

```{r}
graph_1 %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = tax_id, y = n)) +
    geom_point(aes(color = tax_id))
```


```{r}
graph_1 %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = tax_id, y = n)) +
    geom_point(aes(color = tax_id)) +
    scale_y_log10()
```
